tool_description: Generate configurable lorem ipsum placeholder text for use in design and development projects.

api_list.name: /v1/loremipsum
api_list.description: API Ninjas Lorem Ipsum API endpoint. Returns one or more paragraphs of lorem ipsum placeholder text.

optional_parameters.name: max_length
optional_parameters.description: Maximum character length for the generated text.

optional_parameters.name: start_with_lorem_ipsum
optional_parameters.description: Whether to begin the text with the words "Lorem ipsum". Must be either true or false. If unset, a default value of true will be used.

optional_parameters.name: random
optional_parameters.description: Whether to randomly generate paragraphs. Must be either true or false. If unset, a default value of true will be used.

optional_parameters.name: paragraphs
optional_parameters.description: Number of paragraphs to generate. If unset, a default value of 1 will be used.
